actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A joint resolution to authorize the President to use the Armed Forces of the United States to protect citizens of the United States being evacuated from South Vietnam and to require that a report thereon be submitted in accordance with the provisions of the War Powers Resolution.

summary.text: Authorizes the President to use the Armed Forces of the United States to protect citizens of the United States being evacuated from South Vietnam and to require that a report thereon be submitted in accordance with the provisions of the war powers resolution. Directs that such forces shall be removed by the President if Congress so directs by joint resolution.

titles.title: A joint resolution to authorize the President to use the Armed Forces of the United States to protect citizens of the United States being evacuated from South Vietnam and to require that a report thereon be submitted in accordance with the provisions of the War Powers Resolution.
